#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin >>t ;
	while(t--)
	{
		char s[100005];
		cin>>s;
		long int t,d,i;
		t=0;
		d=0;
		int flag=0;
		for(i=0;i<strlen(s);i++)
		{
			if(s[i]=='T')
			t++;
			else
			d++;
			if(d>t)
			{
				flag=1;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(flag==1)
		cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		else if(d==t)
		cout<<"YES"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		
	}
	return 0;
}
